mdRecord.dcterms:description: It was remodeled and extended by George Champlin Mason (1876) and later by Stanford White (1881). It was owned by the King family from 1864 until 1972, when it was given to the Preservation Society of Newport County. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kingscote_(mansion) [work]
